name: PLG Contact us button on Send All touches view

elements.name: for PLG user verify Contact us button on Send All touches view opens in new tab

steps.name: I read the file with the "profiles" and "plgUser"
I open up the core page
I enter the username in the username field on the login page

steps.name: I enter the password in the password field on the login page
I click on the submit button of second button
I verify the new tab for Contact Us form
I click on the eGifts tab to change view to eGifts

I click on the Sendoso Direct tab to change view to Sendoso Direct touches
